programme.title: Teen Mom: Too Much Too Soon
programme.desc: Catelynn and Tyler learn they will get to go visit Carly for the first time in a year. Amber breaks it off with Gary for good and starts dating a new guy, and Farrah learns the results of Sophia's DNA test.

programme.title: Teen Mom: See You Later
programme.desc: A year after the adoption, Catelynn and Tyler have an emotional reunion with their daughter Carly. Amber & Gary try to work out custody of Leah now that they are broken up and dating other people. Farrah's mom sets her up on a date with a new guy.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Taking It Slow
programme.desc: Teen Mom Maci confronts her ex about child support. Amber chooses between her baby's dad and her new boyfriend. Catelynn and Tyler consider moving in together while still in high school, and Farrah considers making a big change.

programme.title: Teen Mom: To Be With You
programme.desc: Amber and Gary move in together while Tyler's family questions his decision to move in with Catelynn. Maci considers letting her boyfriend move in with her and Bentley to make ends meet - and Farrah struggles with being away from Sophia.

programme.title: Teen Mom: The Last Straw
programme.desc: Amber finds out that she is being investigated, and fears she will lose custody. Ryan wants to meet Maci's new boyfriend, while Sophia's paternal grandmother is suing for visitation rights. Tyler's dad gets out of jail.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Trials and Tribulations
programme.desc: Catelynn struggles to fix her relationship with her mom, while Amber & Gary meet with Child Protective Services. Maci finally decides to move away from Kyle and back home to Chattanooga, and Farrah goes to court.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Trick or Treat
programme.desc: Maci and Ryan argue over who has rights to Bentley on his birthday, and Amber breaks down over being separated from Leah. Farrah struggles to spend time with Sophia, and Catelynn and Tyler look for jobs.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Terrible Twos
programme.desc: Amber is upset when Gary refuses to celebrate Leah's birthday together, and Catelynn copes with her fears about adoption. Farrah gets a puppy, while Maci's Ex finally discovers that her boyfriend is living with her.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Without You
programme.desc: Farrah takes her daughter Sophia on a trip to visit Sophia's dad's grave, and Amber and her mom get in an argument.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Taking It Up A Notch
programme.desc: Amber goes on a date, while Catelynn and Tyler get their parents involved with planning a perfect Christmas. Maci makes a shocking announcement, and Farrah breaks the news to her parents that she wants to move to California.

programme.title: Teen Mom: As Long As We're Together
programme.desc: Farrah and her parents argue while on a trip, and Catelynn reunites with her father. Amber reaches out to Gary to re-unite her family on the anniversary of a tragedy, while Maci considers withdrawing from school.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Stay With Me
programme.desc: Amber spends the night in jail, and finds out that a no-contact order has been put on her and Gary. Catelynn and Tyler have a falling out, and Farrah explores moving to Florida. Maci is overwhelmed while taking care of Bentley.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Time Out
programme.desc: Maci has a blowout with Ryan over custody, while Amber and Gary struggle with a no-contact order. Catelynn finally finishes high school, and Farrah's parents try to talk her into leaving Sophia behind when she moves away.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Pros & Cons
programme.desc: Amber and Gary try to get the no-contact order lifted, while Maci tries to cut Ryan out of her life. Farrah makes an unexpected choice about moving away, and Butch moves in with Catelynn and Tyler.

programme.title: Disaster Date: Episode 7
programme.desc: Olivia can't cope with a date who isn't over his ex, Iker must share his blind date with another guy and then is asked to pick up the tab, and Joey tries to silence a girl obsessed with musicals.

programme.title: Disaster Date: Episode 8
programme.desc: Tracy dates a professional gamer who ditches her for his online buddies. Mike's date ends up shaking it with another guy. Mollie, a vegetarian pacifist, is set up with a goose-hunting bully.

programme.title: Disaster Date: Episode 9
programme.desc: Rubina's blind date is short on cash and tries dancing his way out of the jam, Ashley is set up with a fraternity guy - but it's an academic fraternity, and Katie gets lost in translation when her date doesn't speak English.

programme.title: Disaster Date: Episode 10
programme.desc: Ashley loses patience when her blind date can't pay any attention to her, Adam's brother hooks him up with an inappropriate yoga instructor, and Calvin goes out with a girl who should be called Ms Hair Everywhere.

programme.title: Disaster Date: Episode 11
programme.desc: Anna is set up with a dog lover who only has eyes for his pooch, Stephanie's blind date strips down to a thong at an art gallery, and Lionel's friend sets him up with a possessive chick who's out to mark her territory.

programme.title: Disaster Date: Episode 12
programme.desc: Rachel is set up with a musician whose serenade hits too close to home, Heather's blind date starts with a guy but ends with a girl, while Laura's date is better than her at everything!

programme.title: Disaster Date: Episode 13
programme.desc: Vedran's blind date doesn't have time for small talk or etiquette, Brittney is set up with a super zero, Ryan can't score when his friend hooks him up with a chick obsessed with winning.

programme.title: Disaster Date: Episode 14
programme.desc: Tiffani's paranoid date winds up under the table with tinfoil on his head, while Jeremy's friend hooks him up with a cussing, smoking, ready-to-rumble blind date, and Jessie's guy marches to the beat of a different drummer.

programme.title: Disaster Date: Episode 15
programme.desc: Ashley's friend sets her up with a know-it-all who really knows nothing - including manners, Oren's blind date is an insecure beauty queen who melts down, and Matt gets schooled on his date with a kindergarten teacher.

programme.title: Disaster Date: Episode 16
programme.desc: Katie is speechless on her date with a motivational speaker while Kaiulani counts all the reasons she hates her OCD-number-crunching blind date, and Rocio's sister hooks her up with an immature prankster.

programme.title: Disaster Date: Episode 17
programme.desc: Chris has his sister to thank for a blind date who acts like a baby, Chrissy's narcoleptic date seems to fall asleep only when she's talking, and Eric deals with not one irritating ditz, but two.

programme.title: Disaster Date: Episode 18
programme.desc: Kristin's friend has the last laugh as Kristin gets clowned, Josh's blind date takes the stage to embarrass him with a song, and Jalica's sister sends her on a Disaster Date with a hot shot who spends the evening dissing her.

programme.title: Disaster Date: Episode 19
programme.desc: Michael's hippy chick makes him reduce, reuse and reexamine blind dating, Brandon wants nothing to do with a redneck train wreck, and Erika looks for an exit when she's hooked up with a constant complainer.

programme.title: Disaster Date: Episode 20
programme.desc: Audrea's friend sends her on a Disaster Date with an insecure whiner, David's smoking hot date turns out to be a dude, and Anjelica gets an unwanted puppet show on her blind date.

programme.title: Friendzone: Conner and Gaby
programme.desc: Conner is in love with his best friend Brittanie and must try to convince her that he should be more than her "shopping partner". Gaby reveals her feelings to her best friend Nick.

programme.title: Friendzone: Heather and Gary
programme.desc: Heather must convince her best friend Gary that she's more than "one of the guys", while Kevin tries to prove to Janine that nice guys finish first.

programme.title: Friendzone: Peter and Christie
programme.desc: Peter's best friend, Victoria is going off to college and he MUST confess his feelings before she leaves. Christie, a hockey player with Olympic aspirations, must get out of the Friendzone with her best friend Dylan.

programme.title: Friendzone: Alex and Dan
programme.desc: Alex wants his best friend Anthony to be his first boyfriend. Dan puts years of friendship on the line to confess his feelings to Katie.

programme.title: Friendzone: Fitz and Shelly
programme.desc: Fitz hopes that confessing his love to his best friend Michelle will lead to love. Shelly thinks that her "clown" persona won't turn off her best friend as she asks him to be her boyfriend.

programme.title: Friendzone: Jamie and Jackie
programme.desc: Jamie has only known Steve for a year but the feelings she has for him make her want to be more than friends. Together Jackie and Frank have lost almost 200 pounds, newly fit Jackie now wants to make Frank her boyfriend.

programme.title: Friendzone: Jeremy and Nate
programme.desc: Jeremy plans a picnic to confess his deep affection for his best friend Amanda. Self-proclaimed ladies' man Nate thinks he's finally found a girl to make him quit his partying ways.

programme.title: Friendzone: Angelica and Shivani
programme.desc: Angelica attempts to steal her best friend John away from his current girlfriend. Shivani reveals her true feelings to BFF Parth.

programme.title: Friendzone: Jaci and Ed
programme.desc: Katy wants to make her friend of eight years, Brian, her boyfriend. Jaci reveals her heart to her best friend Ed right before his rock show.

programme.desc: After going to the last two proms with Tyler as friends, Polly is ready to upgrade her relationship. Stephanie wants to retire her party girl image and ask Josh to be her boyfriend.

programme.title: Friendzone: Stephanie and Sean
programme.desc: Stephanie is tired of only fantasizing about Mike's "sexy face" and is ready to make him her boyfriend. Sean and Kate were friends at first sight, now Sean wants to up the stakes.

programme.title: Friendzone: David and B-Hawk
programme.desc: David tells his best friend Maia that he's been in love with her for nine years. B-Hawk tries to prove to his friend Toni that there's more to him than meets the eye.

programme.title: Friendzone: Kris and Rachel
programme.desc: Kris tries to woo his best friend Lauren with a special love song. Rachel musters the courage to tell Billy how she really feels.

programme.desc: Bryan and Megan have been best friends for ten years and he can no longer keep his feeling contained. Kenise thinks that she and James can be more than workout buddies.

programme.desc: Artsy Krystal confesses her love to her unsuspecting friend Nishell. Mike tells gal pal Rachel that he's in love with her.

programme.desc: Alex tells his best friend's sister that he has strong feelings for her. Asha tells her friend Chris that she wants more than friendship.

programme.desc: Aja confesses her feelings to best friend Charles. Paulie tries to convince his friend Bethany that there is more between them that just friendship!

programme.title: The Hills: Lauren and Jason: Part 2

programme.title: The Hills: Jason's Birthday
programme.desc: Lauren races home from an all-day Teen Vogue event to be with Jason on his birthday, but the night doesn't turn out as she expected. Audrina seeks Heidi's advice for her latest date with model/actor, Danny.

programme.title: The Hills: Boyfriends and Work Don't Mix
programme.desc: Jason becomes a mounting distraction in Lauren's professional and academic life. Heidi finally gets her big chance to work in the nightclubs, but it couldn't have come at a worse time.

programme.title: The Hills: Somebody Always Has to Cry
programme.desc: It's the gang's first Holiday in LA and not everyone gets what they wish for. A New Year's kiss proves hard to come by for Lauren when Jason finds out she got an unexpected call from an old flame.

programme.title: The Hills: You Can't Just Be With Me?
programme.desc: Jason wants to make Lauren's 20th birthday special but when she lies to him about working with male models for a Teen Vogue assignment their relationship is put to the test.
programme.sub-title: You Can't Just Be With Me?

programme.desc: Heidi finally decides she's had enough drama with Jordan. When she turns to the girls for advice, she realizes what she has to do to. With their fighting days behind them, Lauren and Jason think about taking things to the next level.
programme.sub-title: Love Is Not A Maybe Thing

programme.desc: When Lauren's hard work at LA Fashion Week leads to a career opportunity of a lifetime, she is torn between her job and her boyfriend. Whitney says goodbye to LA for the summer, and Heidi and Audrina look forward to being single in the city.

programme.title: The Hills: Out With The Old
programme.desc: After a rocky summer with her boyfriend Jason, Lauren decides to break it off and returns to Teen Vogue to face her unhappy boss. Heidi finds herself in trouble with a guy both she and Audrina are dating.

programme.title: The Hills: When You Least Expect It
programme.desc: Lauren goes on her first date since Jason and is tested at work when she's asked to work a fashion show. Heidi has a life-changing secret she must tell her boyfriend.

programme.title: The Hills: The Best Night Ever
programme.desc: When an uninvited Audrina shows up at Heidi's birthday, she learns Heidi's not ready to forgive and forget. Lauren, determined to focus on work, falls for the charms of the new guy in her life, Brody.

programme.title: The Hills: Who Do You Trust?
programme.desc: Audrina tells Heidi about Spencer's cheating ways, but Heidi is doubtful - until she sees it for herself. Lauren continues to wonder whether she is ready for a relationship.

programme.desc: Heidi takes a break Spencer but finds herself missing him more than she'd like. Lauren has to plan a Teen Vogue dinner but takes a backseat to super-intern Emily from New York.

programme.title: The Hills: You Have Chosen
programme.desc: When Lauren tells Heidi what she really thinks about Spencer, Heidi must choose between her best friend and her boyfriend.

programme.desc: Spencer asks Heidi to move in with him but Heidi doesn't know what to do or how to tell her roommate, Lauren.

programme.desc: Lauren's 21st birthday is full of surprises when Heidi and Audrina throw her a party.

programme.desc: Heidi's social circle shrinks as Spencer "breaks up" with Brody for hanging out with Lauren.

programme.title: The Hills: They Meet Again

programme.title: The Hills: For Better Or Worse
programme.desc: Lauren is shocked to learn that Jason has a girlfriend, but Jason has a bigger surprise for her.

programme.desc: The gang celebrates Brody's birthday in Vegas and Audrina's boyfriend causes a rift in her friendship with Lauren.

programme.title: The Hills: What Goes Around

programme.desc: Lauren starts a new romance with a male model but realizes she still has feelings for Brody.

programme.desc: In dieser Woche zeigt MTV Cribs Sängerin und Social-Media-Star Loren Grey in ihrem glamourösen Haus in L.A. Außerdem geht es nach London, wo Big Zuu und die Jungs zu viel kochen, uns ihren „Hof“ zeigen.

programme.title: MTV Cribs International: Kenya Moore & Johnny Orlando
programme.desc: Die Atlanta-Hausfrau Kenya Moore gibt uns einen unvergesslichen Einblick in ihr Reich. Selbstfahrende Autos und Salzwasserpools, es gibt alles! Dann geht's an die Westküste, um die riesige Villa des sensationellen Sängers Johnny Orlando zu besuchen.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Wormquake! (Part 1 & 2)
programme.desc: Facing Shredder's deadly new assassin, Leo must decide whether to risk his brother's lives or ask for Splinter's help. Donnie must put aside his rivalry with Casey in order to uncover a new Kraang plot.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mazes & Mutants
programme.desc: The Turtles try to relax by playing a fantasy role-playing game, but when the game becomes real, they must learn the difference between fantasy and reality.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Lonely Mutation of Baxter Stockman
programme.desc: Feeling guilty for turning April's father into a mutant bat, the Turtles perfect a retro-mutagen to help him. Unfortunately, things get worse when Baxter Stockman threatens to mutate April.
programme.sub-title: The Lonely Mutation of Baxter Stockman

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Newtralized!
programme.desc: Raph is worried about Casey's ability to handle big mutant threats … when they meet Slash again and discover he has a partner of his own: THE NEWTRALIZER!

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Wrath of Tiger Claw
programme.desc: Tiger Claw returns and intends to destroy the Turtles at any cost.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Pizza Face
programme.desc: Mikey discovers that a new mutant is trying to attack and capture people using living pizzas, but he struggles to convince the others who don't believe him.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Legend of the Kuro Kabuto
programme.desc: Leo, worried about Karai, tries to convince the others to rescue her, while a master thief steals Shredder's helmet, and it falls into the Turtles' unsuspecting hands.
programme.sub-title: The Legend of the Kuro Kabuto

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Plan 10
programme.desc: Raph's hot-headed impulsiveness lands him in deep trouble when he accidentally damages a machine that forces him to switch minds with a Kraang.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Vengeance is Mine
programme.desc: Leo goes behind Splinter's back when he stages a rescue for Karai, whose desire for revenge against Shredder brings about grave consequences for them all.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: A Chinatown Ghost Story
programme.desc: As Donnie becomes increasingly jealous of April and Casey's relationship, April is kidnapped by an evil spirit who intends to drain April's powers.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Into Dimension X!
programme.desc: At home, Mikey always messes things up, but when the Turtles go to the bizarre realm of Dimension X, he's the only one who can figure the place out.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Invasion (Part 1 & 2)
programme.desc: Leo and Donnie disagree about their plan to stop the Kraang invasion. When Leo makes a critical mistake, he is separated from the team and Donnie must step up as a leader.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Within the Woods
programme.desc: The team comes to grips with the possibility that Leo won't get better, while things only get worse: a new mutant captures Raph!

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: A Foot Too Big
programme.desc: The Turtles discover Bigfoot in the woods, and Donnie befriends it, insisting they protect it from a hunter that is after it.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Buried Secrets
programme.desc: The team discovers a Kraang ship buried under April's house where they find … April's Mom! But as April reconnects with her lost mother, is she really all that she seems?

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Croaking
programme.desc: An upset Mikey runs away from home and befriends a Mutant Frog in the woods. When he learns its Frog family plans to attack the human world, he has to figure out a way to stop them.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: In Dreams
programme.desc: Creatures that feed off dreams trap the Turtles inside their own dreams as April and Casey must find a way to wake them up.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Race with the Demon
programme.desc: Casey and Donnie bond over building Casey's new hot rod, but their newfound friendship is challenged by Speed Demon, a hot-rodding mutant who is terrorizing the roads.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Eyes of the Chimera
programme.desc: When Casey, Raph, Mikey, and Donnie are captured by a new mutant, both April and Leo must overcome disabilities in order to save them.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Vision Quest
programme.desc: Leo takes the Turtles to train in the woods in an advanced ninja ritual where they must overcome their weaknesses and face their greatest enemies in order to become a true ninja.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Return to New York
programme.desc: The Turtles return to the city to search for Splinter, only to find that the city is overrun with Kraang.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Serpent Hunt
programme.desc: As the Turtles search for Karai, they have to deal with a city filled with Kraangdroids as well as Zeck and Steranko, who hunt Karai for their own means.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Pig and the Rhino
programme.desc: Donnie finishes a new batch of retro-mutagen, hoping to save Karai, but the Turtles find themselves hunted by Shredder's new vengeful henchmen … Bebop and Rocksteady!

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Battle for New York (Part 1 & 2)
programme.desc: While the Mighty Mutanimals lay siege to TCRI, the Turtles must brave the bizarre world of Dimension X to save the enslaved people of New York.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Casey Jones VS. the Underworld
programme.desc: Casey Jones thinks he can take on the criminal underworld on his own, but he soon finds himself in over his head.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Noxious Avenger
programme.desc: A new mutant called Muckman starts to gain notoriety as NYC's "Monster Hero".

programme.title: Städte am Meer: Hongkong
programme.desc: Hongkong, heißt es, sei die schnellste Stadt der Welt, weil sie sich ständig neu erfindet. Das einstige Fischerdorf an der Südküste Chinas ist schon seit langem eine Megametropole.

programme.title: Städte am Meer: Sankt Petersburg
programme.desc: Sie ist die glanzvollste Metropole an der Ostsee. Als Peter der Große begann, in den Sümpfen an der Newa eine Zarenresidenz zu errichten, war dies der Beginn einer neuen Ära. Russland bekam Zugang zur Ostsee – und ein „Fenster nach Europa“.

programme.title: Städte am Meer: Marseille
programme.desc: Marseille - die heimliche Hauptstadt des Mittelmeers ist Frankreichs älteste und zweitgrößte Stadt. Für die einen vibriert sie vor Lebenslust und Kreativität, für die anderen versinkt sie in sozialen Problemen.

programme.title: Städte am Meer: Hamburg
programme.desc: Hamburg – die norddeutsche Metropole lebt vom Wasser. Seit dem Mittelalter bringt der Handel über die Meere der Hansestadt Wohlstand. Elbe und Alster prägen den Alltag ihrer Bewohner.

programme.title: Brojects - Zwei Brüder bauen um: Die Küche im Freien
programme.desc: Dieses Mal haben sich Andrew und Kevin vorgenommen, die ultimative mobile Außenküche zu bauen. Eine Küchenstation auf Rädern, die sie jederzeit zu einem anderen Platz auf ihrem Grundstück schieben können.

programme.title: Brojects - Zwei Brüder bauen um: Die ultimative Dachterrasse
programme.desc: Die Brüder Andrew und Kevin sind dafür bekannt, sich selbst zu übertreffen, wenn es um ihre Do-It-Yourself-Kreationen geht. Auch die folgende Idee ist nicht ganz ohne: Eine Rooftop-Party auf dem Dach von ihrem Seehaus.

programme.title: Brojects - Zwei Brüder bauen um: Das ultimative Outdoor-Schlafzimmer
programme.desc: Auf ihrem Grundstück ist leider nicht genug Platz für viele Besucher, und so entscheiden sich die Brüder für ein Gästezelt. Es soll eine saisonale, gemütliche und vor allem trockene Outdoor-Schlafanlage werden.

programme.title: Brojects - Zwei Brüder bauen um: Das ultimative Strandauto
programme.desc: Als Andrew und Kevin einen traditionellen Ford Country Squire - innen mit Holz getäfelt, mit schönen Sitzbänken und einem großen Triebwerk - aus dem Jahr 1967 erstehen, haben sie gleichzeitig eine Idee.

programme.title: Brojects - Zwei Brüder bauen um: Die geheime Werkstatt-Kneipe
programme.desc: Es gibt eine Sache, die Andrew und Kevin sogar mehr lieben als ihre Bauprojekte: So zu tun, als würden sie etwas bauen, obwohl sie in Wahrheit nichts tun. Um das aber vor ihren Frauen zu verstecken ...

programme.title: Brojects - Zwei Brüder bauen um: Das Wasser-Quad
programme.desc: Kevin und Andrew haben endlich einen Weg gefunden, ihren Geländewagen mit Allradantrieb von ihrem Gelände auf die kleine Insel inmitten des hauseigenen Sees zu verlagern. Bei diesem Vorgehen dienen ihnen Frachtkräne und Binnenschiffe als Vorlage.

programme.title: Brojects - Zwei Brüder bauen um: Nur für Frauen
programme.desc: Die Brüder Andrew und Kevin holen sich Inspiration von ihren Frauen, da sie den beiden Hüttenzauber am Wochenende garantieren wollen. Es soll die weibliche Form der Männerhöhle werden.

programme.title: Brojects - Zwei Brüder bauen um: Das Gäste-Bootshaus
programme.desc: Das Bootshaus von Andrew und Kevin ist bis jetzt immer nur eine große Abstellkammer gewesen. Jetzt wollen sie es allerdings auf Wunsch ihrer Eltern in einen besonderen Bereich umwandeln.

programme.title: Brojects - Zwei Brüder bauen um: Eine sportliche Auffahrt
programme.desc: Als die Brüder herausfinden, dass ihre Einfahrt die flachste und größte Fläche auf ihrem Grundstück ist, haben sie eine Idee, um diese sinnvoll und vor allem vollständig auszunutzen: Eine multifunktionale Ebene.

programme.title: Brojects - Zwei Brüder bauen um: Das Seifenkistenrennen
programme.desc: Bis heute ergaben sich die Projekte von Kevin und Andrew immer spontan aus der Situation heraus und waren nicht beabsichtigt. Das ändert sich heute: Für den Sieg bei einem Seifenkistenrennen wollen sie den perfekten Wagen entwickeln.

programme.title: Brojects - Zwei Brüder bauen um: Das schwimmende Eisfahrrad
programme.desc: Ein Sommertag bricht an, und für die Brüder gibt es an solchen Tagen nichts besseres als einen Sprung in den kalten See und einer leckeren Kugel Eis. Natürlich wäre das alles deutlich einfacher, wenn sie für das Eis nicht erst noch an Land zurück müssten.

programme.title: Brojects - Zwei Brüder bauen um: Ofenbau für Anfänger
programme.desc: Als Kevin und Andrew einen Nahrungsmittelmangel auf ihrem Anwesen bemerken, nagen sie jedoch ideenmäßig keineswegs am Hungertuch. Mit einem neuen Projekt wollen sie ihr Problem lösen: Ein ultimativer Brotofen muss her.

programme.title: Brojects - Zwei Brüder bauen um: Die schwimmende Feuerstelle
programme.desc: Am Lagerfeuer Lieder singen ist das absolute Highlight der Landhaus-Erfahrungen für die Brüder Andrew und Kevin. An diesem Wochenende haben sie Besucher aus der ganzen Seeumgebung bei sich eingeladen.

programme.title: Der Traum vom eigenen Pool - Vom Eigenbau bis zum Luxus-Schwimmbad
programme.desc: Keine Möglichkeit zu reisen? Kein Problem. Wer es sich leisten kann, der legt sich seinen persönlichen Wellness-Bereich einfach im eigenen Garten an. Swimmingpools gibt es in zahlreichen Ausführungen, Größen und Preisklassen.

programme.title: Brojects - Zwei Brüder bauen um: Die Bar
programme.desc: Andrew und Kevin sind gerade erst in ihre neue und großräumige Bude gezogen. Das ist eine ehemalige Halle mit vielen offenen Räumen, die allerdings erst noch gefüllt werden müssen.

programme.title: Brojects - Zwei Brüder bauen um: Die Schlafboxen
programme.desc: Nach einer unruhigen Nacht, beschließen die Brüder Andrew und Kevin, nun auch Betten in ihre Hütte zu bauen. Schließlich liefern sich die beiden ein Kopf-an-Kopf-Rennen. Wer schafft es als Erster, ein super schickes Bett zu bauen?

programme.title: Brojects - Zwei Brüder bauen um: Die Klettertreppe
programme.desc: Kevin und Andrew wollen hoch hinaus. Ihre neueste Idee? Eine Kletterwand, die entlang der Haupttreppe gebaut werden soll. Doch dazu benötigen sie auch die Hilfe ihres befreundeten Ingenieurs ...

programme.title: Brojects - Zwei Brüder bauen um: Die Grillstation
programme.desc: Die Brüder Andrew und Kevin wollen für ihre neuen Nachbarn etwas ganz Besonderes kochen. Als die Nachbarn ihnen jedoch mit einem herzlichen Willkommen und einem geschenkten Barbecue-Grill zuvorkommen, möchten sie sich revanchieren.

programme.title: Brojects - Zwei Brüder bauen um: Halfpipe-Wohnzimmer
programme.desc: Die beiden Brüder Kevin und Andrew sind keine Männer, die halbe Sachen machen. Vor allem nicht, wenn es um ihr neues Haus oder ihre neu gefundene Leidenschaft Skateboarden geht.

programme.title: Brojects - Zwei Brüder bauen um: Waldklo im Haus
programme.desc: Während die Brüder Andrew und Kevin die ganze Zeit im Inneren ihres neuen Hauses gefangen sind, um dort Renovierungsarbeiten vorzunehmen, vermissen sie immer mehr die Natur des Familien-Cottage am See.

programme.title: Brojects - Zwei Brüder bauen um: Die Sportsbar
programme.desc: Da ihr absolutes Liga-Lieblingsteam im Baseball nun kurz vor der Meisterschaft steht, wollen Kevin und Andrew ihre Teampräferenz auf ihrem eigenen Grundstück deutlich zum Ausdruck bringen.
